name: Las Viudas del Capo
description: Las Viudas del Capo is a movie starring Raquel Sarabia Michel, Karla Orrante-Copado, and Leo Bucio. Antonio Quintero is The Chief, and everybody obeys him, gunmen and corrupt cops alike. His self assurance does not provide him with...
keywords: treason,corruption,revenge,woman shoots a man,man shoots a woman
